Capital Cities Quiz

Welcome to Capital Cities Quiz! This app has quizzes to test your knowledge of the state capitals in the United States. Take a quiz consisting of six questions and see if you can guess the capital of the state presented to you. Past scores and quizzes will be saved and you will be able to take as many quizzes as you\'d like. In order to see all the features this app has available to you, open the nav drawer in the top left corner of the screen to see the navigation menu.

These are the options presented:

Take Quiz
Click this in order to take a quiz! Each quiz consists of six questions and you are therefore quizzes on six different states. Each question will list three cities found in that state and you must decide which one is the state\'s capital. Your score will be presented at the end of the quiz.

Review History
On this screen you will be able to view all your past quizzes. The states you were quizzed on, your score, and the date at which you took the quiz will be displayed. The quizzes will be listed from newest to oldest.

Need Help
Helpful information about the app and all of it's features.

Close App
The app will close immediately.
